alert.note: Alert for Chase (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cowley, Chase, Butler, southeastern Marion and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1114 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from near Strong City to near Benton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Andover, Augusta, Rose Hill, Douglass, Towanda, Cottonwood Falls, Benton, Leon, Strong City, Florence, Potwin, Burns, Rosalia, Cassoday, Bazaar, Elmdale, Matfield Green, Cedar Point and Santa Fe Lake. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 55 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and east central Kansas.
